connect-github.title: Change Handle
connect-github.description: Connect with GitHub and personalize your app profile effortlessly! By clicking the 'Connect' button, you'll use your GitHub login as your handle on the app and your GitHub avatar. It's a seamless way to bring your GitHub identity to our platform.

errors.github-already-exists: This github handle already exists in another account

notifications-form.title: Notifications
notifications-form.message: Allow Bepro Marketplace to send you updates via email. These can include updates to tasks, app updates, etc.
notifications-form.re-send-email: A confirmation email was sent, please check your inbox and spam box.

email-errors.expired-link: This confirmation link is expired. Try re-sending another email.
email-errors.try-again-later: Something went wrong, try again later
